PIZZA OR CALZONE.description: Pizza and Calzone are served with choice of soup or green salad and soft drink. All Calzone Include Ricotta Cheese.

Deluxe.ingredients: Pepperoni, Italian sausage, mushrooms, onions, bell peppers, olives, tomato sauce, and mozzarella.

Vegetarian.ingredients: Mushrooms, onions, black olives, bell peppers, fresh tomato, tomato sauce, and mozzarella.

BBQ Chicken.ingredients: Grilled chicken breast, red onions, cilantro, mozzarella, and tomato sauce.

Roma Tomato.ingredients: Fresh slice of roma tomato, roasted garlic, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil. No tomato sauce.

Eggplant Feta.ingredients: Roasted eggplant, sun-dried tomatoes, tomato sauce, mozzarella, and feta cheese.

Mediterranean.ingredients: Grilled marinated eggplant, hearts of palm, artichoke hearts, sun-dried tomatoes, fresh basil, tomato sauce, and mozzarella cheese.

Western Chicken.ingredients: Marinated Chicken breast, cilantro, fresh tomatoes, jalapeños, avocado, and mozzarella cheese.

INDIVIDUAL PIZZA.description: With choice of one topping. $6.55 Extra topping. 60 cent

PASTA.description: All pastas are served with garlic bread choice of salad or soup and a soft drink.

Angel Hair Pomedora.ingredients: Roma Tomato, basil, garlic, mushrooms, Parmesan Cheese, wine, and olive oil.

Baked Ziti.ingredients: Pasta mixed with Ricotta cheese and marinara sauce baked under a blanket of Mozzarella cheese.

Tortallini Primavera.ingredients: Cheese Tortallini with choice of cream sauce, or tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh vegetables.

Chicken Parmesan.ingredients: Breast of chicken on a bed of fettuccini homemade tomato sauce, topped with mozzarella cheese.

Eggplant Parmesan.ingredients: Breaded eggplant prepared in our delicious marinara sauce with mozzarella cheese on fettuccini.

Chicken Alfredo.ingredients: Breast of chicken on bed of Fettuccini with Alfredo Sauce and Parmesan Cheese.

SALADS.description: All Salads Include Garlic Bread. Choice of Dressing: Italian, Ranch, Blue Cheese, Thousand Islands, Caesar, and Vinaigrette.

Chicken Pasta Salad.ingredients: Chicken, breast, Penne, red peppers, garlic, zucchini, tomato sauce, and Parmesan Cheese.

Caesar Salad.ingredients: Fresh romaine, croutons, Parmesan cheese, with our Caesar dressing.

Turkey & Salami.ingredients: Turkey, salami, mixed greens, fresh tomatoes, kalamata olives, fresh basil, pepperoncini, and mozzarella cheese with balsamic vinaigrette.

Spinach Salad.ingredients: Fresh baby spinach with Roma tomatoes, feta cheese, sun-dried tomatoes, artichoke hearts with balsamic vinaigrette.

Greek Salad.ingredients: Blend of mixed greens and baby lettuce, Roma tomatoes, feta cheese, red onions, Greek olives, cucumbers, and pepperoncini with choice of Italian dressing or balsamic vinaigrette.

Anti Pasto.ingredients: With salami, ham, pepperoni, black olives, tomatoes, red onions, mozzarella cheese, and pepperoncini on mixed greens.

Grilled Chicken.ingredients: Breast of chicken, mixed greens, tomatoes, red onions, pepperoncini, black olives, and mozzarella cheese.

Grilled Shrimp.ingredients: Large shrimp with penne pasta, red peppers, tossed with balsamic vinaigrette on bed of mixed greens.

BBQ Chicken Salad.ingredients: Marinated chicken glazed with BBQ sauce, black beans, tomatoes, cheese, tortilla chips bed of greens – BBQ dressing.

Chicken Avocado Salad.ingredients: Grilled chicken, romaine, avocado, artichoke, red onions, tomatoes, and kalamata olives.

Beverages.description: Quench your thirst with our refreshing selection of beverages, ranging from classic sodas like Coke and 7UP to a variety of teas, fruit juices, and specialty drinks. Whether you're craving a fizzy cola, a zesty citrus soda, or a soothing cup of tea, we have the perfect beverage to complement your meal and keep you refreshed.

GOURMET SANDWICHES.description: All sandwiches are served with salad or soup and soft drink. Your choice of wheat or sourdough bread.

Eggplant Chicken.ingredients: Chicken breast with grilled eggplant, feta cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, mayonnaise, and Dijon mustard.

Vegetarian Sandwich.ingredients: Fresh sliced avocados, sun-dried tomatoes, lettuce, tomatoes, alfalfa sprouts, provolone cheese, mayonnaise, and Dijon mustard.

Grilled Chicken & Avocado.ingredients: Grilled chicken breast, slices of avocado, lettuce, tomatoes, alfalfa sprouts, mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, and provolone cheese.

BBQ Chicken.ingredients: Grilled chicken breast, grilled red onions, cilantro, lettuce, tomatoes, provolone cheese, and special BBQ sauce.

Tuna Sandwich.ingredients: White albacore tuna blended with cucumber, fresh dill, celery, red and green onions, lettuce, tomatoes, provolone cheese, mayonnaise, and dijon mustard.

Chipotle Chicken Sandwich.ingredients: Chicken breast, chipotle sauce, mayonnaise, lettuce, melted mozzarella cheese, and tomatoes.

Basil Chicken Salad Sandwich.ingredients: Chicken breast blended with potatoes, cucumbers celery, fresh basil, red onion, mayonnaise, and mustard.

Hot SANDWICHES.description: All sandwiches are Transitional and served with salad or soup and soft drink.

Roast Beef.ingredients: Sliced roast beef mozzarella, tomatoes, lettuce, and mayonnaise.

Pastrami.ingredients: Lean slices of pastrami, mozzarella, pickles, and mustard.

Chicken Parmesan.ingredients: Chicken breast, mozzarella, and tomato sauce.

Club.ingredients: Sliced roast beef, turkey, and ham served with lettuce, tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and mayonnaise.

Chicken Sub.ingredients: Breast of chicken, mozzarella cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, and mayonnaise.

Meatballs & Cheese.ingredients: Homemade meatballs, melted mozzarella cheese, and Italian tomato sauce.

Italian Sausage & Cheese.ingredients: Italian sausage links, melted mozzarella cheese, and Italian tomato sauce.

Eggplant.ingredients: Slices of breaded eggplant, melted mozzarella, and Italian tomato sauce.

Ham & Cheese.ingredients: Slices of ham, lettuce, tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and mayonnaise.

Hero Sandwich.ingredients: Salami, Canadian bacon, pepperoni, mozzarella cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, and mayonnaise.

Cold Sandwiches.description: All sandwiches are Transitional and served with salad or soup and soft drink.

Submarine.ingredients: ham, turkey, roast beef, salami, provolone cheese, lettuce, tomato, onions, oil, vinegar, salt, pepper

Turkey.ingredients: turkey, provolone cheese, lettuce, tomato, onions, oil, vinegar, salt, pepper

Avocado and Cheese.ingredients: avocado, cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, onions, oil, vinegar, salt, pepper
